# PHPickerCapabilities

**Structure**

Options that customize the look and behavior of the photos picker.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PHPickerCapabilities
```

## Overview

This enumeration defines the possible values for the photo picker configuration ([doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct]) property [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/disabledCapabilities].

## Specifying features

- **collectionNavigation**: A capability that corresponds to a sidebar or the Albums tab.
- **selectionActions**: A cabability that represents the Cancel and Add buttons.
- **search**: A capability that corresponds to the search bar.
- **sensitivityAnalysisIntervention**: A capability that prompts for confirmation if a person selects a photo that contains nudity.
- **stagingArea**: A capability that corresponds to an area in which the selected photos display.

## Creating a capability

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a photo picker capability.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
